b4434301-b9ce-4db3-8acd-fc17fb5dac11.name: 能使用超自然能力获得情报

3f312742-51ac-442e-8fef-92efad85f032.name: 执法权
3f312742-51ac-442e-8fef-92efad85f032.notes: Thought Police officers II1l1st have Legal Enforcement Powers and a -5-point Duty; retired officers will have neither.

9b3027c3-c64d-487e-96b7-7dfae8a36f55.name: 少眠
9b3027c3-c64d-487e-96b7-7dfae8a36f55.notes: 每级此优势——最多 4 级——允许你减少一个小时的睡眠需求

6b66eb28-851c-4fc3-9322-913590e5da50.name: Curious (base -5)
6b66eb28-851c-4fc3-9322-913590e5da50.notes: 在遇到有趣的物品或情况时进行一个自控检定

268e9836-275b-4233-a654-cd1736353d7a.name: 范围：任何与你不同的人

features.situation: 来自感受到你的歧视的对象（最高到 -5，GM 决定）

61fe8ecd-323a-43ed-b717-611237443c5d.name: Overconfidence (base -5)
61fe8ecd-323a-43ed-b717-611237443c5d.notes: 如果 GM 认为人物过于谨慎，可能要求人物进行自我控制检定，如果检定失败，人物不再畏缩不前，就像你能解决问题一样！

features.situation: 来自年青幼稚的人，他们相信你的吹牛

c1143878-5536-4d30-9447-c721bfdad5aa.name: 遵纪守法
c1143878-5536-4d30-9447-c721bfdad5aa.notes: 当你“必须”违反无意义的法规的时候，你必须进行一次自控检定；如果你失败了，你必须遵守这条法律，不论后果如何。如果你成功地抵挡了你的守法冲动违法了，在事后进行第二次自控检定，如果失败，你就必须向权力机构自首！

53fe6a30-be93-4d32-a605-c59f88544dc9.name: 精神打击
53fe6a30-be93-4d32-a605-c59f88544dc9.notes: Offense ability. Overload someone's brain with a psychic attack.

3812b739-784e-444e-8437-71d6a36a2778.name: Mental Blow_3
3812b739-784e-444e-8437-71d6a36a2778.notes: Mental Blow at range; -1 penalty/yard distance

d92248c1-2c96-4183-8e1f-4093a35d878f.name: 心灵护盾
d92248c1-2c96-4183-8e1f-4093a35d878f.notes: Sense and defense ability.You have a mental shield protecting you.

ef3ca8e9-92cb-4ec9-b7fa-c87c15279064.name: 精神抹除
ef3ca8e9-92cb-4ec9-b7fa-c87c15279064.notes: Control ability.  You can wipe the last few minutes from someone's mind.

6e20c2a1-aef7-4bb7-b785-e7eb75170baa.name: 灵能感知
6e20c2a1-aef7-4bb7-b785-e7eb75170baa.notes: Divination ability. You can sense nearby psionic activity.

fd6a304e-c027-424b-89bd-006a80215320.name: Psi Sense_2
fd6a304e-c027-424b-89bd-006a80215320.notes: Gives direction of nearest psi use

9ce04a54-d6e6-4252-9199-84a16c873203.name: Psi Sense_3
9ce04a54-d6e6-4252-9199-84a16c873203.notes: Direction and distance to nearest psi usage

a8591246-fe76-4de8-bf61-32ff65b9241e.name: Psi Sense_4
a8591246-fe76-4de8-bf61-32ff65b9241e.notes: Direction, distance, and ability of nearest psi usage

128634b2-8304-4c1c-9ef1-6ad4544e18fe.name: 暗示
128634b2-8304-4c1c-9ef1-6ad4544e18fe.notes: Control ability.  You can send telepathic commands to a subject.

2164418e-41ac-47db-b580-108bda2be75a.name: 心灵接收
2164418e-41ac-47db-b580-108bda2be75a.notes: Communication ability. You can read another person's thoughts.

6a9e6ab2-6e03-481b-aad1-ca1629d9a8d4.name: 心灵扫描
6a9e6ab2-6e03-481b-aad1-ca1629d9a8d4.notes: Sense and defense ability. You can search for minds you know.

8901d217-a51c-47e3-bce7-6a27cbce22e3.name: 心灵传话
8901d217-a51c-47e3-bce7-6a27cbce22e3.notes: Communication ability. You can read project your thoughts into another's mind.

50c5cdd5-27fd-440a-a068-ffa4348f6ed4.name: 地域知识
50c5cdd5-27fd-440a-a068-ffa4348f6ed4.notes: 所有重要商行、街道、市民、领导等。

67317d34-20d1-4dc4-876f-7b84399d359a.name: Judo
67317d34-20d1-4dc4-876f-7b84399d359a.notes: 使得你获得每轮用两只手各招架一次的能力。
